resources.string: Complete this mighty quest for epic loot by having an awesome adventure.
We have no idea how to track your progress for this quest, so you have to mark this quest as done manually. \nYou ain\'t cheating anyways, right?
Just do a little backflip. Don\'t worry, we will ask you to backflip again in 3 minutes
Time to take a stroll! Let\'s go outside for walk alone or with people from your household.
Call a family member or a friend. Although it is called social distancing, it\'s actually about physical distancing.
Grab a tea, lay down on your couch or a comfortable chair and start reading a good book.
